title: Study for "Napoleon at Eylau"
medium: Artificial black chalk, with white chalk, on thick, grey-green silked paper
description: This drawing is squared in preparation for transfer; the majority of the figures merely blocked in. Just left of center Napoleon is shown astride a horse. His right arm extended to the left of the drawing to a group of three figures gathered around a man on the ground. Behind them a group of figures with a rider with his back turned.  On the right of the drawing a larger group of  soldiers and horses, struggling.  The foreground shows three groupings of wounded and killed.
name: Drawing
